name: Love Is Blind (Anish Sharma)
description:
This game is intended for Brackey Game Jam #2.

Love Is Blind. Love is literally blind. The heart is blind and roams around in the realm of love and demons. It can't protect itself from the demons that intend to destroy it. You must protect love, you must protect the heart.
The game is a shooter game. You get a gun to kill demons. Demons come in squads in each wave. Game gets harder as you advance in waves. Three types of demons -

  • Brown Demon - Damages love in its presence
  • Purple Demon - Similar to Brown Demon but harder to kill
  • Pumpkin - Fire Ball spitting demon. Its the strongest and hardest to kill

if you are lucky you might get a love power up or a damage power up to help you in your cause..

You must fight for love and survive.
Wish you luck!
